column1: Assistant Manager / Manager - HR - Campus Hiring and Employer Branding
column2: Company Profile  Aurionpro is an IT Product and Services organization with more than 2400 employees across the globe. We help enterprises to embrace Digital Transformation across Banking, Mobility, Payments and Government sectors through a platform led approach.  We are CMMI level organization and Great Place to Work certified. Aurionpro caters to a host of clients across BFSI, Digital Solutions for Government and Logistics industry. We have headquartered in Mumbai and have our presence in Asia, North America, Europe, UAE.  To know more about the organization, you may go through the company website: - www.aurionpro.com. Job Title: Assistant Manager / Manager  HR Role : - Campus Hiring and Employer Branding Location : Navi Mumbai Experience Level ??8yrs+ Prior experience in leading Campus Hiring from Tier 1 colleges in IT / Product organisation will be added advantage. Position Overview:  We are seeking a dynamic and strategic-minded individual to join our team as Assistant Manager / Manager ??HR  ( Campus Hiring and Employer Branding). In this role, you will be responsible for developing and executing campus recruitment strategies while also leading initiatives to enhance our employer brand and attract top talent to our organization. Key Responsibilities: Develop      and implement comprehensive campus recruitment strategies to identify and      attract top-tier talent from universities and colleges. Plan      and coordinate campus events, including career fairs, information      sessions, workshops, and networking events, to engage with students and      promote our employer brand. Build      and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including      university career centers, faculty, student organizations, and campus      ambassadors. Create      compelling employer branding materials, including brochures,      presentations, videos, and social media content, to showcase our company      culture, values, and career opportunities. Collaborate      with marketing and communications teams to ensure consistency in messaging      and branding across all channels. Monitor      and analyze recruitment metrics and feedback to measure the effectiveness      of campus hiring and branding initiatives and identify areas for      improvement. Stay      updated on industry trends and best practices in campus recruitment and      employer branding to enhance our strategies and processes. Drive various strategic      initiatives in Talent Acquisition with focus on DEI initiatives. Support Talent Acquisition      team with recruitment initiatives as and when required. Qualifications: Masters      degree in Human Resources, Marketing, Business Administration, or a      related field; Master?? degree preferred. 8 years+      of experience in campus recruitment, employer branding, talent      acquisition, or related fields. Proven      track record of successfully sourcing and hiring top talent from      universities and colleges. Strong      project management skills, with the ability to plan and execute multiple      initiatives simultaneously. Excellent      communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and      build relationships with diverse stakeholders. Creative      thinker with a passion for storytelling and creating compelling content. Familiarity      with social media platforms, employer branding tools, and recruitment      technology. Ability      to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing      priorities. Commitment      to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion in the workplace.

column2: Website: www.infojiniconsulting.com About Infojini Inc. We are ranked as one of the INC 5000 fastest-growing companies for the last five years, Infojini has 17+ years of experience in providing?IT?services to clients. We have extensive experience with Fortune 500 and government clients such as the State of Maryland, State of Texas, State of Washington, State of California, and many more. Infojini delivers tailored solutions that enhance end-user productivity, reduce staff training, and improve the quality of services our clients provide to their internal organization, as well as to their customers. The firm's in-depth expertise enables its clients to surmount today's common challenges, as well as to prepare in advance, for their constantly changing?IT?needs. Overview:  We are seeking a dynamic and motivated individual to join our team as a Campus Recruiter. The Campus Recruiter will be responsible for developing and implementing recruitment strategies to attract top talent from universities and colleges. This role requires a strong ability to build relationships with students, faculty, and university career centers to ensure a robust pipeline of candidates. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, a passion for talent acquisition, and a commitment to diversity and inclusion. Key Responsibilities: Develop and execute campus recruitment strategies to attract high-potential candidates from targeted universities and colleges. Build and maintain relationships with university faculty, staff, and student organizations to enhance the organization's presence on campus. Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their recruitment needs and develop tailored strategies to meet those needs. Plan and coordinate campus events, including career fairs, information sessions, and networking events. Conduct presentations and workshops to educate students about career opportunities within the organization. Manage the full recruitment life cycle, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and extending offers to candidates. Utilize social media and other channels to promote campus recruitment initiatives and engage with potential candidates. Analyze recruitment data and metrics to track progress and identify areas for improvement. Stay informed about industry trends and best practices in campus recruitment and share knowledge with the team. Ensure compliance with all relevant policies, regulations, and legal requirements related to campus recruitment. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree Previous experience in campus recruitment, Bulking Hiring, or related field preferred. Strong interpersonal and networking skills with the ability to build relationships with diverse groups of people. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present effectively to large groups Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Demonstrated commitment to diversity and inclusion in recruitment practices. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and experience with applicant tracking systems (ATS) preferred. Willingness to travel to universities and colleges as needed. Additional Information: This is a full-time position based at [Thane]. Flexible work hours may be required to accommodate campus events and activities. Competitive salary and benefits package offered. Opportunities for professional development and growth within the organization. Note: This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the position and is not an exhaustive list of skills, efforts, duties, responsibilities, or working conditions associated with it.

column2: Job Description We are looking for a dynamic Associate  Training and Placement to join our team. In this role, you will collaborate with students, recruiters, and other teams to monitor student progress, provide feedback, assist with career development, and align students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Job Function:? Student Progress Monitoring: Monitor and assess the academic and career progress of students. Provide regular feedback to students to enhance their employability. Career Development Assistance: Assist students in resume building, interview preparation, and job search strategies. Offer guidance to help students achieve their career aspirations. Alignment of Job Roles: Work with students to identify their strengths and interests. Match students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Collaboration: Efficiently collaborate with students, recruiters, and cross-functional teams to ensure the smooth execution of placement activities and events.? Organize collaborative events, workshops, masterclasses, super sessions, placement drives, and outreach initiatives to facilitate networking opportunities for students and engage industry leaders, potentially creating hiring prospects with streamlined coordination. Requirements Skills: Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills are essential for effective interaction with students and other stakeholders. Career Guidance: A passion for guiding and mentoring students in their career development. Interpersonal Skills: Excellent interpersonal skills to build rapport with students and collaborate with teams. Analytical Skills: Ability to assess student progress and align job roles with their skills and aspirations. Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, Slides, etc.) is required. Basic Digital Marketing Knowledge: A fundamental understanding of digital marketing concepts is essential. Qualification: Education: A bachelor?? degree in any field. Experience: Prior experience in career counseling, training, or placement services is a plus. Mumbai Residents Only

column2: Do you want to be a part of the fascinating story of over 500 iconic brands spanning across more than 100 countries? Being the best beer company starts with finding the best people. While we have big brands, we have bigger opportunities as well. AB InBev India is looking to hire for Manager Talent Attraction in People team based out Bangalore. Primary Purpose of the role The role holder will be responsible to work closely with relevant stakeholders across all functions, Business Partners and COEs to strategize and deliver the agendas of Talent Attraction & Campus Hiring Strategies for India BU. Role Responsibilities Talent Attraction Manage the existing Global and Local Talent Programs  GMT (Global Management Trainee), FLP (Future Leaders Program), SVP (Sales Visionary Programs), SCVP (Supply Chain Visionary Program) and MVP (Marketing Visionary Program), Summer Internship Manage the budget for Talent Programs and develop local programs to attract talent and retain future company leaders in the context for BU India Develop strategies and coach the Talent Squad accordingly to align and standardize the selection process for all talent programs End-to-end management for Unstop competition: 100+ to attract top talent and build a sustainable Employer Brand for AB InBev Drive a comprehensive & integrated employer brand strategy to engage and interact with the targeted talent pool. Drive initiatives in line with our goal to be known as the Employer of Choice and ensure a good mix of talent pool across channels such as social media, campus partnerships, recruiting events, talent communities, etc. Knowledge, Skills & Abilities Education level and/ or experience MBA in HR from a premier B-School 2  4 years of Talent Attraction, Campus Hiring Experience Skills and/or knowledge Exceptional Organizational & Time Management Skills Ability to lead and inspire people Good commercial acumen High level of communication and interpersonal skills Ability to build effective relationships Personal attributes High energy Solution-oriented and positive attitude Exceptional customer orientation Fast-mover, quick to adapt Flexibility and resilience in a fast-moving environment Integrity and professionalism And above all of this, an undying love for beer!  Quench your thirst for success. Come, sit at the table

column2: Job Title:  Campus Alliance Intern Location:  Noida (Work from Office), Monday to Friday Duration:  2 months; can start anytime between 15th May to 1st June and to be available for 2 months Stipend:  Rs. 10,000/- per month. Conduct thorough market mapping of various campuses to identify potential talent pools and strategic partnerships. Campus Alliance Extraordinaire:  Forge strong alliances with key stakeholders in campuses to foster lasting relationships and enhance our brand presence. Data Dynamo : Take charge of data management processes with finesse! Ensure accuracy and completeness of campus data, constantly updating and refining it for maximum efficiency. Talent Liaison Champion : Be the bridge between us and the talent placement officers! Reach out to them, verify contact details, and stay updated on any changes or developments. Expansion Enthusiast:  Uncover untapped potential! Identify and map additional campuses not yet in our database, expanding our reach and influence. Requirements: Passionate about campus outreach and recruitment with excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Proactive and detail-oriented, able to manage data effectively and maintain accuracy. Adept at networking and building professional relationships. Proficient in MS Office Suite Perks: Hands-on experience in campus outreach and recruitment, a valuable addition to your resume. Mentorship and guidance from professionals in the field. column2: UnStartED is looking for Campus Ambassador Intern to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are looking for enthusiastic and motivated individuals to join our Campus Ambassador program      As a Campus Ambassador, you will represent our company on your college or university campus, acting as a liaison between the student community and our organization      This is an exciting opportunity for students to gain real-world experience, build their professional network, and contribute to the promotion of our brand on campus      Responsibilities:Brand Representation:Promote our brand and create awareness about our products/services on campus      Be a visible and positive representative of our organization within your academic community      Event Coordination:Plan and execute on-campus events, workshops, and activities to engage students      Collaborate with campus clubs, organizations, and event organizers to enhance our presence      Social Media Promotion:Utilize social media platforms to share updates, organize online campaigns, and interact with the student community      Create and share content that resonates with the target audience      Feedback and Insights:Gather feedback from students about our products/services and report insights to the marketing team      Provide suggestions for marketing strategies tailored to the campus demographic      Networking:Build and maintain relationships with key influencers, student leaders, and faculty members      Identify opportunities for partnerships and collaborations on campus      Communication:Act as a point of contact between the company and students, providing information and answering queries      Communicate effectively with the marketing team to align campus activities with overall brand strategies

column2: Job Title: - Manager  Campus Hiring Job Brief: - We are looking for a driven campus hiring manager to source and attract talented students for our clients.  You will be required to identify and define hiring needs, source talented candidates through events and advertising campaigns, interview potential candidates, and monitor newly recruited employees and interns.  To be successful as a campus Manager, you should demonstrate an excellent ability to attract and engage with potential candidates. A skilled campus Manager should be a critical thinker and able to clearly identify vacancy requirements and suitable talent.  Responsibilities: -  Visiting different college campus for conducting campus interview, will involve travelling Interviews, tests, and refers candidates to the appropriate employment positions by visiting different college campuses.  Administer all on campus recruitment; prepare appropriate strategies for all campus events and interview processes.  Coordinate and maintain relationships with the clients as well as with the colleges.  Design appropriate strategies and monitor effective implementation of all plans according to procedures.  Manager will be responsible for campus advertising.  Managers should make all necessary arrangements to schedule interview dates.  Report on recruiting metrics after every career event, including number of candidates interviewed and hired.  Coordinate and maintain relationships with the clients as well as with the colleges.  Design appropriate strategies and monitor effective implementation of all plans according to procedures.  Managers will be responsible for campus advertising.  Managers should make all necessary arrangements to schedule interview dates.  Screen resumes, conduct interviews and perform skills assessment tests for junior positions and internships.  Campus Manager Requirement: - Efficient Communication skills and confident personality  Good interpersonal skills  Understanding employment interview techniques.  Proficiency in Microsoft Office software, including Word and Excel.  Ability to organize campus drive  Location: Lower Parel, Mumbai Exp: 10 to 12 years

Hands-on experience with resume databases and Applicant Tracking Systems.      Familiarity with social media sourcing.     Understanding of labor legislation, particularly regarding internships.     Good networking abilities.       QUALIFICATIONS    : MBA-HR or equivalent       EXPERIENCE    : Min 2 5 Years

column2: A Student Placement Officer is responsible for assisting and supporting students in finding suitable internships or job placements during their academic programs.         Major Responsibilities:           Arrange internships for all the eligible students within two weeks of course completion         Advising students on resume and cover letter writing, interview preparation, and overall career development         Ensure placement for all the eligible students within 45 days of course completion         Ensure all the students are registered in the SpotGiraffe platform soon after their course completion         Developing and maintaining relationships with companies, organizations, and employers to identify internship and job placement opportunities for students         Collaborating with faculty and management team to integrate placement activities into the overall academic curriculum         Perform weekly/monthly feedback calls with employers regarding the placed students and prepare a report and share the same with CEO, COO& CAO         Maintaining accurate records and databases of student placements, employer contacts, and internship/job opportunities         Requirements:           Ability to work with minimum supervision         Experience in placement or recruitment preferred         Should have a good command of English         Excellent interpersonal skills         Qualification:           Should be a graduate/ postgraduate

column2: Responsible for summer and final placement of students .         Should establish excellent relations with companies through personal visits and other means of communication.         Should invite prospective recruiting companies to the campus as per priority that is based on the best interest of the students and the organisation.         Should ensure that the process of campus recruitment by each company is systematically carried out as per the standard procedure.         Should constantly maintain close interaction with students and student coordinators so as to get firsthand information with respect to all activities under his purview.
